verses.name: Judges 20:10
verses.text: And we will take ten men of an hundred throughout all the tribes of Israel, and an hundred of a thousand, and a thousand out of ten thousand, to fetch victual for the people, that they may do, when they come to Gibeah of Benjamin, according to all the folly that they have wrought in Israel.

verses.name: Judges 20:11
verses.text: So all the men of Israel were gathered against the city, knit together as one man.

verses.name: Judges 20:12
verses.text: And the tribes of Israel sent men through all the tribe of Benjamin, saying, What wickedness is this that is done among you?
